page.title: 02Farming_Weir Bridge Farm
page.content: {Pigs.}The pig farm at Muston has about 900 pigs which consist of 5 boars,150 sows and the rest are piglets.They are fed different types of meal for fattening piglets,boars and pregnant sows.These meals consist of barley,fishmeal,powdered milk,and some other ingredients. {Farm buildings.}There are 9 buildings on the farm.One of these buildings is for pregnant pigs,one for pigs that have been weaned (this means taken from their mothers).There are other sheds for pigs of increasing size and weight.One is for sows,and one is for boars.There is a mill for grinding meal,their house and a storage shed. {Markets_where the pigs go.}Some pigs go to be bacon some go to the butchers and some go to the market at Malton.
